attributes.action: include the House of Commons canteen in the National Smoking Ban.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the smoking in public places ban comes into force on July 1st this year, the only public place in Britain where people can still smoke will be the House of Commons canteen. This is horrendously unjust and totally hippocritical and I ask that you immediately include the canteen in the ban and put up a no smoking sign there.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/commonssmokeban/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
